de.rincewind.api.gui.windows

Interface WindowBrewing

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventBased, Modifyable, Window, WindowActivatable, WindowColorable, WindowContainer, WindowEditor, WindowNameable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftWindowBrewing, TestWindow2, Windows.WindowBrewingExtendable

    public interface WindowBrewing
extends WindowActivatable
    This window is a BrewingInventory. To set elements in this window, you can use four slots:
    • Slot 0: new Point(0, 1) (left potion-slot)
    • Slot 1: new Point(1, 1) (middle potion-slot)
    • Slot 2: new Point(2, 1) (right potion-slot)
    • Slot 3: new Point(1, 0) (catalyst)
    Since:
    2.3.3
    Author:
    Rincewind34
    See Also:
    Windows.WindowBrewingExtendable
